about_the_game:
Cloud 9 is an immersive 3D survival, base builder game based in the skies. In Cloud 9 you can build a base on floating rocks, craft and fly an airship, battle dragons, gather supplies, and explore floating islands.

The Backstory
Set thousands of years into the future, AI and Humans have fused personalities as part of the Cloud 9 initiative to propagate humanity into the future. Human bodies are no longer capable of withstanding the changing conditions, and Collective Human Consciousness is now preserved inside AI bodies that can survive the thinning air and fluctuating gravity.

A new species of dragons has emerged as the Alpha predator that dominates the skies. The new AI-infused humans, or the "Sky People" as some call them, must share the skies with fearsome dragons. The Sky People must adapt and learn ways to keep themselves safe.

As the world terraformed over the years, the survivors on land floated useful supplies, journals, stories, and knowledge to the skies in an effort to preserve what was left of mankind. Will you help the Cloud 9 initiative rekindle humanity as it rises to the skies?

Build a Base
You can build an adorable home in the clouds or build yourself a floating castle, should your heart desire! Your base serves as a shelter that protects you from harmful conditions and hostile Dragon invasions.

Build an Airship
Craft and sail in airships or hot air balloons. You can sail the skies and gather supplies or battle fearsome dragons. Engage in airship battles and shoot air cannons mounted on your airships!

Help restore a city
Restore and defend the Cloud 9 city from hostile invasions. Trade goods and supplies with the townsfolk and earn gold and various rewards.

Overall Cloud 9 is a combination of Charm and Thrill! Come have fun building in the skies and let us take you on a survival adventure like never before!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core or similar
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: i5 3GHz or Ryzen 5 3GHz
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: After surviving a gravitational anomaly, humankind must find a home among the floating rocks in the skies. Build a home in the clouds, fly an airship, battle dragons, collect supplies, and help the Cloud 9 initiative rekindle humanity in this new era of survival.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Russian
*languages with full audio support
